_description: ‘Oracio Presidentis’ in ruling the house, invoking St Robert — forty-seven couplets

BLEge3143.First Lines:
Hayle saint Robert a confessoureÞate suetely serued oure
                    saiuoure…
BLEge3143.Last Lines:
…And helpe þus þat yit may beAmen. Amen per
                    charite
